title: Power - motors pulling blocks up ramps

content.question: In each of the figures shown, a motor pulls identical blocks up a ramp at the same constant speed. Friction between the blocks and the ramp is negligible. Which of the following correctly compares the instantaneous power <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>P</mi></math> delivered by the motor at the instants shown in the figures?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub 1 equals P sub 2, which equals P sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub 1 equals P sub 2, close parenthesis, which is greater than P sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub 1 equals P sub 3, close parenthesis, which is greater than P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub 3 is greater than P sub 1, which is greater than P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub 1 equals P sub 2, close parenthesis, which is greater than P sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
